introduction: His novel, filmed as 2001: A Space Odyssey, won Clarke and director Stanley Kubrick cult status. He is listened to by the United Nations, US Congress, Microsoft, and NASA. In a rare interview from his tropical paradise home in Sri Lanka, he talks about his life, from his upbringing in rural Somerset to the writing of his latest novel, 3001: The Final Odyssey.
